description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. This xbox version of the game beer pong allow for people around the world to join the brotherhood of First South and experience a match of beer pong. The game is taking place in the kitchen of the legendary First South dorm at Helsingkrona Nation, Lund, Sweden.
